APP_ID.description: A random, public, identifier for this application

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Mailgun API

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key ID for interacting with Amazon Web Services

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret access key for interacting with Amazon Web Services

S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket used to store files
